product_name: Moving Comfort Sprint Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Sprint half-zip top from Moving Comfort provides soft, performance fabric with ruched seams in just the right places for a flattering look. Polyester and spandex fabric maximizes comfort while wicking moisture and drying quickly. 11 in. front zipper offers instant ventilation. Rear storage pocket stashes essentials. Thumbholes warm hands and keep sleeves in place when arms are in motion. The semifitted Sprint half-zip top from Moving Comfort moves with you during exercise without binding. Reflective details on back. Closeout.
short_description: The Sprint half-zip top from Moving Comfort provides soft, performance fabric with ruched seams in just the right places for a flattering look.
